message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a decent cut.  Accept and we both win.
Let's be more even this time.  I'm willing to take a smaller share, but I need to get more than your last offer.
Let's try to be a bit more reasonable this time.  I'm willing to compromise, but we need to be able to both walk away feeling like we got a fair deal.  Accept this and we can end this quickly.
This is my final offer.  I'm willing to split the difference, but we need to move forward and reach a compromise.  If you reject this, we're both going to lose a lot of money.
